Articles.Content:
I sat down today and planned out my first year of launches (after "today" in my game: Year 1, day 43) using Alex Moon's launch planner. Some of the earlier launch windows are suboptimal, but I found I could still get a decent window even though I had missed an earlier one (I've also already made trips to Moho and Eve in this save game). Arrival times are assumed to be approximations because I can't set up a maneuver node with such precision.

Jool 1 - Departure: Year 1, day 54

Duna 1 - Departure: Year 1, day 59

Moho 1 - Departure: Year 1, day 67

Eeloo 1 - Departure: Year 1, day 70

Dres 1 - Departure: Year 1, day 86

Moho 1 - Arrival: Year 1, day 102

Duna 1 - Arrival: Year 1, day 125

Moho 2 - Departure: Year 1, day 128

Eve 1 - Departure: Year 1, day 144

Moho 2 - Arrival: Year 1, day 168

Jool 2 - Departure: Year 1, day 169

Moho 3 - Departure: Year 1, day 168

Eeloo 2 - Departure: Year 1, day 171

Eve 1 - Arrival: Year 1, day 194

Moho 3 - Arrival: Year 1, day 203

Dres 1 - Arrival: Year 1, day 233

Moho 4 - Departure: Year 1, day 234

Dres 2 - Departure: Year 1, day 244

Moho 5 - Departure: Year 1, day 269

Moho 4 - Arrival: Year 1, day 270

Eeloo 3 - Departure: Year 1, day 280

Jool 3 - Departure: Year 1, day 282

Duna 2 - Departure: Year 1, day 290

Moho 5 - Arrival: Year 1, day 305

Eve 2 - Departure: Year 1, day 313

Moho 6 - Departure: Year 1, day 341

Duna 2 - Arrival: Year 1, day 359

Eve 2 - Arrival: Year 1, day 360

Moho 6 - Arrival: Year 2, day 7

Dres 2 - Arrival: Year 2, day 25

Jool 1 - Arrival: Year 2, day 105

Jool 2 - Arrival: Year 2, day 190

Eeloo 1 - Arrival: Year 2, day 177

Jool 3 - Arrival: Year 2, day 222

Eeloo 2 - Arrival: Year 2, day 278

Eeloo 3 - Arrival: Year 2, day 284

I might skip some of the Moho flights because there are so many available.

Does anybody else do this sort of thing? Does anyone have a "standard template" of launch windows created for starting a new game?
That's an interesting way to plan it. So far, I've just been doing a mix of seeing what's coming, and choosing the windows I want.

That's an interesting way to plan it. So far, I've just been doing a mix of seeing what's coming, and choosing the windows I want.

Well, to be honest, I have this irrational fear of using the time warp, so planning it all out in advance calms me down.

I like this idea. I shall appropriate it. It might cause me to venture out beyond Duna. Cheers!

Edited August 3, 2013 by Milkshakefiend
Typo
yes i do. I got a spreadsheet with everything from launch-windows to delta-v calculations, TWR, and so on. Every equation i could find for KSP
